“I need to get out of here.” She said while placing a hand on her throat. ‘Is that how I sound like?’

She got up shakily, not having used to her newly formed feet, teetering a bit and thrown off balanced due to her large breast. After regaining herself, she headed out the door that lead to a long sandy colored torch lit hallway covered head to toe with hieroglyphics. Walking slowly down the path, her eyes scanned the pictures of anthro dog men and women doing various activities among images of pyramids, reeds, and other Egyptian related figures including what looked like the scarab from earlier.

She placed a hand on the beetle that attached itself to her, tugging on it a bit. Still stuck in there alright. But it felt as if it was truly a part of her like an extra limb. She shook her head. She needed to find help, anyone that can tell her where she is, how to turn back into a male, and to get her back home.

As she picked up the pace, she came across another dilemma, a fork in the road with a perpendicular hallway leading left or right.

Which path did she take?

Scooby looked at his new surroundings it was ancient Egyptian styled with hieroglyphics on its sandy clay colored walls and is lit up with a hanging lantern from the ceiling. There were some potted ferns and green plants in each corner of the wall, giving it somewhat of a quaint homely feel.

But the main draw of the room was in the center, a six to seven foot onyx statue of an Egyptian jackal Anubis dressed in gold and white with sapphire eyes that seemed to glow hypnotically that looked so lifelike with forearms squared and stretched out like holding a box. In front of that, looked like some kind of massage table with a red velvet cushion and head rest. Something Scooby was actually familiar with whenever Daphne wanted to drag the gang to a nearby spa during a mystery.

It looked really inviting to him as he approached the table and started to get on it, positioning and lying on his...

1543322222222222122222222222222222222222.content:
The light after the teleportation diminished as Scooby's eyes adjusted itself and coming to.

"Rooohhh....My rhead...Where....where ram I?'

He got a good look at his surroundings. It was a big room with sandy colors all around him with yellow stone bricks with markings on the walls with four supporting pillars in each corner. He recognized the markings as hieroglyphics from his travels to Egypt in the case of the Mummy's Curse with Mystery Inc. But what was odd these was that instead of humans there were humanoid/anthropomorphic canines judging by their heads. They were very detailed that he can even tell their breed from Dalmatians to German Shepherds to Rottweilers, all doing some kind of activity from farming to bowing before royalties and gods/goddesses.

But the real eye catcher was the long rectangular table covered in pristine white cotton table cloth in the center of the room. So long that it had ten chairs on each long side with one regular chair at one end while a very ornate looking one occupies the other. It looked slightly bigger than the rest with gold surfacing and lettering and hieroglyphics embedded into it. On that table was an incredible spread of food by plates and bowls full. It was like a buffet with many selections. Bowls of grapes and other fruit, steamed and cooked vegetables, plenty of meat such as pork, chicken, beef, and more, baskets of bread and among other array of food on display.

But why all this food is set up here? And most important, where are the people to eat it? Why set it up and not eat?

*Groooooowl

His train of thought was disrupted by his complaining stomach. Maybe it would be fine to have a bite eat. Better not let this food go to waste, right? Scooby then approached the table.

What does Scooby eat?

After the effects of the teleportation wore off, Scooby took a look at his new surroundings.

It was a room made out of sandy stones with four pillars in each corner of the room with torches lighting the room. He can make out hieroglyphics on the walls that are like the ones he has seen in Egypt during the Cursed Mummy Case, but depicts some kind of canine humanoid creatures doing various activities such as farming and other things. Along the walls were various ceramic clay urns and vases with lids on them.

In the middle of the room was golden sarcophagus, roughly 7ft and adorned with hieroglyphics as well as gems engraved in them. Although just like the hieroglyphics, the head portion of the casket resembled a canine form with a muzzle and pointed ears. Also, the molded hands had claws that wielded a staff and a bone in the folded arms. Looking at it, gave Scooby the chills and wanted to get away from it as quickly as possible.

Beyond that on the other side of the room was the doorway. Scooby tried to go around the sarcophagus and exit the room. But as he got close to it, the lid suddenly and unexpectedly slid opened, causing him to jump back in surprised and then _____.

1543322222222222122222222222222222222222.content:
"Ungh....ooohhh....Rere...Rere am I?"

After the effects of the teleportation wore off, Scooby found himself in some kind of medieval shoddy house.

It was one entire room made out of grey stone, including the unlit fireplace that had a black kettle hanging in it, a roof/ceiling made out of straw with wood rafters, and a wood floorboard. There was a small bed in one corner, a small cabinet with dishes and silverware, a bucket next to it supposedly used for washing, a window on one wall that shows a dirt road in a wide open plain with forestry surrounding at parts, a shelf that held folded clothing, and a short rectangular table with small shoddy three legged stools by it. But what caught his attention was on the table.

What caught his eye was a small brown box with the words "Magic Beans" etched on it in cursive. Curiously, he removed the lid to see a folded piece of paper. After taking it out, five red beans have been revealed to be underneath. He then unfolded the paper to find a simple set of instructions:

1. Plant beans
2. Water
3. Watch them grow!

It sounded pretty silly and farfetched for Scooby though now stuck in this strange place, he didn't have much options at hand.

What happens next?

When Scooby came to, he found himself in a rather wet situation.

He was surrounded by a pinkish fluid. In a panic, he tried to swim up to any kind of surface, only to be pulled back by something attached to him. Looking behind him, he could see a wall of pulsating flesh with veiny tube-like protrusions that were extended and attached and embedded into his back, torso and other parts of his body.

He let out a scream of fright only to realize his mistake, losing his air supply. He gasped and shut his muzzle and that was when came to another realization. He can breathe! Could it be that these tubes are sustaining his life in this place? Exactly where was he anyway?

Scooby tried swimming again to get a better on where he was. He eventually hit a clear membrane wall like a very thick bubble that easily see-through. Peering through he could see that he is….

Where is he?

1543322222222222122222222222222222222222.content:
When the teleportation light faded, Scooby looked around and found himself in a dense forest, surrounded by plenty of pines and other similar trees with shrubbery and flowers.

But behind him was a huge mound with a gaping cave mouth as tall as it was wide, like around 40ft. However, what was odd that there were lit torches on the walls which seemed to be showing how far in goes down a slight incline. It also showed the stalactites and stalagmites looking like the cave's teeth. Of course, for a coward like Scooby, he refused to go inside the spooky place and decided to go elsewhere until...

*BOOM!

"Yipe!"

Scooby yelped and jumped at the sound of thunder. Looking upward, he saw the weather taking a turn for the worst as dark clouds rolled in fast and started to feel heavy raindrops crash against his fur. Without much choice for shelter from the storm, he went into the cave, following the path of torches ahead. Hoping that it'll lead to somewhere safe. Further down he went, he noticed how much the cave walls seem to have smoothed out and somewhat resembled grey bricks that seemed to keep its shape and support, showing signs of construction by man-operated means.

Then, soon he approached a three-way fork in the road that branched into paths: Left, Middle, and Right.

Which path did he take?
1543322222222222122222222222222222222222.title: In a forest

1543322222222222122222222222222222222222.content:
Scooby decided to go left and when further down through the tunnel, following the torch trail.

His travel on the path seemed uneventful for the most part, save for going down some inclines and making some turns. The cave seemed to stretch on for miles and Scooby was showing some signs of fatigue such as panting and slowing down. How long was this cave anyway? Will he be able to reach an end?

Just as he began to ponder these thoughts, he then soon came across...

What did he encounter?

As Scooby turned a corner, he came across a surprising sight.

It was a creature or was it a creature? Hovering towards him, It stood around 5 to 6 feet tall and looked like it was made out of pink crystal like inorganic material. It was shaped in the symbol for the female sex and glowed a pink aura around itself.

Scooby took cautious steps back as it stopped in front of him still floating in air. It started to hum as began to collect energy into the hole on top (or its head?). Scooby ran in the opposite direction away from the thing but unfortunately, not far enough as a pink energy beam struck him in the back hard, knocking him down and causing him stumble and roll to the ground on his side. Remarkably and oddly, the attack didn't do much damage besides singed his back with a minor burn. Scooby watched the elemental float on pass by just before he lost consciousness.

What happens next?

While his paws gripped the staff and his body twitched and trembled by the shocking sensations, his body fell to the ground all the while the tingling sensation amplified. Then the changes began.

His hind paws cracked and morphed into plantigrade humanlike fashion, developing heels, ankles, soles, and five dainty toes with pedicured claws. His hind legs followed, gaining shapely calves and thighs.

His midsection cracked and shifted into a humanoid pelvis, developing wide childbearing hips with thin waistline and bloated booty. His red rocket dick unsheathed, fully erected yet shrunk until it and his ball sac receded into his body. He moaned as a moist pussy took its place.

His torso cracked too as his rib cage widened to human proportions. He groaned again as two dark protruding nipples poked erect on his chest. Then, two globular mounds of flesh slowly grew from A cups to large EE cups.

His forelegs morphed into slender womanly arms with paws that turned into hands with thinly fingers with long dark nails. Finally, his head changed as his face turned feminine with a smaller snout and narrow muzzle. From his scalp, long brown flowing hair grew stopping at mid back.

The male feral Great Dane into a female anthro one.

Did the transformation stop there?

The main attraction in the room was a big pool of water. It was square in shape and seemed to be unnaturally cut and smoothed and about 20 ft long. As he approached the pool, he looked into the water and saw his reflection, noting how pristine and clear it is, like it has been untouched. It was very inviting to him as to take a drink or even go in for a dip.

Not wanting to stay in the creepy cave for too long, he wanted to drink the water to quench his thirst and move on. However, resting and relaxing in the water for some time can soothe his steadily aching paws and be well rested for trip further down. He began to weigh his options.

What does he do?

1543322222222222122222222222222222222222.content:
A bright flash of light illuminated a partially wooded and slightly foggy place as the Great Dane appeared later. The frightened canine shivered and panicked from the sudden teleporting experience. Eventually he calmed down a bit to gather his surroundings.

The glow of the full moon revealed a boggy and humid swamp area with great big puddles of murky algae water strewn all over with reeds and cattails along their edges. Fallen rotten trees can be seen poking through their surfaces. Noises of croaking frogs, buzzing mosquitoes, chirping crickets, and hooting owls filled the air in an off key orchestra. Damp and wet dewy moss filled his snout with such smells.

The eerie scene quite still unnerved Scooby, but he needed to get a move on to anywhere that's safer. As he trek the swamp things seemed uneventful until...

15433222222222222222221.content:
“Like, here we are Scoob!”

Both had arrived to Coolsville dog park, a fenced in small wooded area with well-trimmed hedges, wooden benches, surrounded by tall 3-5ft glass, concrete and brick buildings. A small pond was home for ducks and geese with a small white wooden bridge that went over it.

Shaggy and Scooby joined in some of the activities with fellow dogs of various shapes and sizes from Chihuahuas to Dalmatians and their owners. Playing fetch with tennis balls, dogs sniffing their hindquarters, greeting each other with barks, chasing after squirrels, throwing Frisbees, and other things.

After a while, it was around noon time and the two friends decided to rest on a bench beneath a shade of trees that looked over the pond. Shaggy sat down on the bench while Scooby laid down next to the bench leg.

“Okay, Scoob. *Yawn. Let’s just rest here for a minute and then we’ll go…Zzzzz…”

Scooby rolled his eyes at how quickly his slouching friend had fallen asleep quickly. Not too long after, the Dane let out a big yawn as he laid his head down and his eyes shut into sleep mode. Something peculiar was about to happen to him.

After a while, his body mysteriously started to shrink! His size gradually decreasing with his collar becoming loose after losing inches. He became the size of a puppy to finishing to becoming a size of a tiny mouse.

He stirred from his sleep after a few minutes and when he fully awoke, he panicked to see everything gigantic from the grass looking twice as tall as he is at current height to his collar near Ferris wheel size to his still snoozing friend looking as tall as the surrounding buildings.

“Raggy! Relp!” Scooby said as he flailed his fore legs to grab his sleeping friend’s attention, but it was no use. He was too small to be seen or heard. Scooby whimpered in hopelessness.

“I’m late! I’m late! For a very important date!”

His eyes turned to the right to see an anthropomorphic rabbit dressed in 19th century styled fancy suit and a top hat, wearing glasses and holding a pocket watch. He ran pass the Dane, not heeding his existence, and went through a pair of bushes behind the bench.

“I’m late! Terribly, terribly late!”

That voice sounded familiar to Scooby. It sounded like Mr. Gibbles, the magic store owner during the Goblin king incident! What was he in that rabbit form though? But Scooby shoved that thought to the side and went after him, hoping that he’ll help him with his ‘small’ situation.

He passed the bushes and saw the rabbit went into a hole at the base of the tree. He followed suit but tripped into the opening that had a small drop. He found himself staring down a tunnel and can hear the echoes of the rabbit ahead. As he tried to catch up, he soon found himself in another dilemma. A three-way path fork in the tunnel stopped him and it was hard to know where he went as he couldn’t hear Mr. Gibbles anymore.

Which pathway did he take?
15433222222222222222221.title: Doggone to Wonderland

154332222222222222222212.content: Which pathway did he take?
154332222222222222222212.title: Other

1543322222222222222222121.content:
Scooby just went forward into the center path tunnel, hoping that'll lead him somewhere near the rabbit.

As he continued further, it was getting darker along with the tunnel starting to get smaller and him becoming cramp and claustrophobic. He picked up his pace despite being forced into a half crawl that is until the floor crumbled and gave way.

"RELP!!"

He shouted as he fell straight down. But found himself falling very slowly like a feather or a leaf. On the way down with the rocky walls transitioning into smooth unnatural ones and more man made with decor tan, he passed by some odd items that actually going up such as a bookcase filled with volumes of books, a globe, an ottoman, an urn with bouquet of flowers, a bed and other things of the sort.

Soon, he looked down to see the black and white checker pattern floor approaching fast. As he braced for impact, he landed on something soft. Looking down, he was on purple pillow the size of a large dog bed. He looked back up to see the hole he fell from gone and replaced with checker pattern ceiling, not to different from the floor.

"Rere am I?"

He was in a fairly quaint sized square room, almost like a standard hotel room but twice the height. As stated before, it had black and white checkered tile ceiling and floor and had a light violet walls with some flower patterns etched on the sides. The room had no windows and was barren, save for the purple pillow, a round fancy glass table, and a small door that's about a foot in size.

Scooby approached the table because of the interesting things on it. There were two corked bottles labeled "Drink Me", one with blue liquid and the other with red. It was definitely odd but decided to go with it anyway since there was nothing else he could do being stuck in a room.

He then drank the bottle with the ____ liquid.
1543322222222222222222121.title: The Center Lane

Change Scooby Doo in many ways imaginable from TF to TG to Anthro

Some rules to establish

1. Any kind of transformation possible is allowed. No scat or watersports.
2. No killing or death of main chars.
